Articles.Content:
I find a blue screen when I come back to the computer, and find out is was this game.

I re-instal this game, and delete the old files from all servers.

...reebooting...

(insert restarting comment here)

claiming hill...

90%

complete.

jake9039's hill
Ahh there's your problem this elegants is in the real world not in a computer so it still stands

I wake up,realizing it was a dream,then.

I then start playing ksp and build an ssto.

I then say"my ssto."
I can't argue with THAT! You built it, it SHOULD be yours!

I beg to differ...

my argument.
But as you argue you forget about the massive ship above head.....
that gets shot down from the ops(orbital protection system)

But as I said before my defenses stop it ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

but as before that was a dream,not reality.

and it's still my arguement.

While you guys are arguing about God-knows-what, I claim a hill on a planet in another universe as mine.

My hill and whatever the heck you guys have.

I waltz over to your hill and lie down, sipping some tea next to your scowling face.

your dominion(unless you want to hang out as well) and my hangout.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T04:01:35Z" title="03/18/2015 04:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by jake9039**

I delete the thread and start a new one in which people obey the rules of the game. 

My hill.

I drop a tungsten rod on it.

my hill.

I get your hill and install a few hundred mods in i-

My NaN hill.
Just a reminder, 3 gridmarks people...
I. Repare the hill my hill

I alert the grammar ....'s of your error.

My self-righteous language-freak covered hill.

I burn your people.

my burning self-righteous language-freak covered hill.

You called? (Yes. 4.1 gridmarks away, there is a planet with catastrophe wreaking havoc on the entire secluded system. It was inhabited, but no other life signs of the native species remain)

Why say "native"?

(There is a life sign not native to the planet coming from under the surface. Just with onboard sensors, there appears to be lots of xenotech surrounding him; something we have never encountered. What do you propose we do?)

Hmm, well, if he can wreak havoc on a large spacial scale, it's obvious we're dealing with a big threat here. But we shouldn't sit back and do nothing. Prepare the aerochannel wavelength broadcasters. 

(Already on it, sir)

Attention. Whoever you are underneath the surface of your planet, find you transport vehicle, exit the surface, and leave the planet immediately. 

Come to coordinates 71.335.940.06. You are not in trouble, we just want to talk to you. If you refuse, we will go to the planet and remove you by force. If you respond with aggression, I will send a TCAW to your coordinates. You have 10 minutes to reply.
I travel back in time and destroy your scientists and so you have no such thing as a tcaw, and in fact only have cuddly puppies and bunnies.

It's impossible to change time. If you travel back and kill the scientists, than that means the TCAWs were invented by other means. If you travel back in time, your future self would have already done what you are about to do, and from where you are now tells you that you wont actually change anything. Complicated, I know, but if you think about it, it would explain a lot of paradoxes.

Good try, but I've targeted you with a TCAW, so head to the coordinates I've sent you, or we will be forced to take action.

The flaming people on the hill launch themselves at your ship causing it to crash into the ground

My crater of burnt bodies and spaceship wrecks
At least try to make sense.

I do apologize for not understanding the science fiction terminology and acronyms you have created but what remains of the hill is still mine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I use the gravity gun to launch a nuke at you.

my crater.
